price: Ɛda a Yεbεboa wͻn nyinaa ano no, Yεbεka akyerε wͻn a wͻde biribi bataa Nyankopͻn ho no sε: “Mo ne wͻn a mode wͻn bataa Nyankopͻn ho no, monnyina faako a mogyina no ara. Na Yεbεpaepae wͻn ntam. Wͻn a wͻde wͻn bataa Nyankopͻn ho no bεka akyerε (abosomsomfoͻ no) sε: “Yεn deε εnyε yεn na na mosom yεn no”.
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُهُمۡ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ نَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ أَشۡرَكُواْ مَكَانَكُمۡ أَنتُمۡ وَشُرَكَآؤُكُمۡۚ فَزَيَّلۡنَا بَيۡنَهُمۡۖ وَقَالَ شُرَكَآؤُهُم مَّا كُنتُمۡ إِيَّانَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wayawma naḥshuruhum jamīʿan thumma naqūlu lilladhīna ashrakū makānakum antum washurakāukum fazayyalnā baynahum waqāla shurakāuhum mā kuntum iyyānā taʿbudūna
